EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Tuesday, April 14th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Tuesday, April 14th in Toronto, Ontario. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Tuesday, April 14th, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto>
Pivotal Labs 1 Toronto Street, Suite 1100, 11th Floor Toronto, Ontario M5C 2V6 Maps & Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499311,-79.375757,17z/data=!4m13!1m4!3m3!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2s1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2m2!1d-79.375757!2d43.6499311>
Parking Information If traveling by public transportation, take the subway to King Station or, the 504 or 508 streetcar to the King/Yonge intersection. There are several public parking lots located along King Street, all within a few blocks of Pivotal Labs.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at (631) 388-0569.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto>
